title: Check for a Balanced Equation
text: Check if the equation is balanced or not. If not, balance the equation.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$
Calculate the Molar Amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$
text: What is (702 g $$\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}$$ )*(1 mol $$\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}$$ / $$114.23$$ g $$\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}$$ )? Keep three decimal places.

title: Identify the Stoichiometric Factor
text: The stoichiometric factor relating the two substances of interest is $$25$$ mol $$O_2$$ / $$2$$ mol $$C_8 H_{18}$$.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$O_2$$
text: The molar amount of $$O_2$$ is derived by multiplying the provided molar amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$ by multiplying the stoichiometric factor.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$O_2$$
text: What is $$(6.145$$ mol $$\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}$$ )*(25 mol $$O_2$$ / $$2$$ mol $$\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}$$ )? Keep three decimal places.

title: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$
text: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$ with Mass of Reactant A $$=$$ (Molar Mass of Reactant A)/(Moles of Reactant A)*(Moles of Reactant A).

title: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$
text: What is $$(76.819$$ mol $$\text{O}_2$$ )*(32.0 g $$\text{O}_2$$ )/(mol $$\text{O}_2$$ ))? Give your answer in scientific notation.
